metadata.title: CVE-2021-38009 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in cache in Google Chrome prior to96.0.4664.45 allowed a remote attacker to leak cross-origin data via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
